products.title: Cellular Warm White Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Kalm Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit kalm wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Pure Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any anthraciteupvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected.

products.title: Polar Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit polar wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Real Wood Rich Coffee Bean Perfect Fit
products.description: The rich coffee bean perfect fit is a rich chocolate colour and is one of the darkest woods in their range. This blind works well in any decor due to its warm and soft nature, pairing well with mahogany furnishings. As with all their real wood perfect fits, a matching real wood venetian blind is available for a coordinated finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Real Wood Cedar Perfect Fit
products.description: The golden shade of this cedar perfect fit will bring warmth to any room. The mid-brown honey hue lends itself to any interior, whether it be a companion to those neutral or to balance those stand-out brights. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Real Wood Nude Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Their real wood perfect fits are designed to match their real wood venetian blinds, for a coordinated finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The venetian slats will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.
